resources.string:
As a Fortune 500® company with annual revenues of more than $7.2 billion, EMCOR
Group is a leader in mechanical and electrical construction, industrial and energy
infrastructure, and building services.

EMCOR has a rare combination of broad reach and local execution, combining the
strength of an industry leader with the knowledge and care of 75+ companies across 170+ locations. Build. Power. Service. Protect. That’s the EMCOR AdvantageTM that helps clients increase productivity and optimize their organizations.
